attributes.action: RELEASE ASHYA KINGS PARENTS WITHOUT CHARGE!
attributes.additional_details:
Ashya King is currently in a Hospital in Spain, WITHOUT his parents, as they have been arrested.....

for? Trying to seek treatment to cure their son! treatment that is proven, but not available on the NHS...

We have all been duped into believing they were risking their sins life without the correct equipment.... in fact, Ashya is not on medication, he is tube fed, of which the family ensured he had plenty!

They fled SCARED as they were threatened legal action to prevent them being with their son.

They need to be with their son, and to be his voice.
